CareTask.name: CareTask
CareTask.description: Represents additional information about a healthcare-related task such as process status, beneficiary, and related tasks.

ActionCodeId.description: A name or code that describes the task.

ActualEndDate.description: The date when the task ends.

ActualStartDate.description: The date when the task starts.

BeneficiaryId.description: The party who benefits from the task.

ClinicalEncounterId.description: The associated clinical encounter for which the task was created.

ContentResource.description: Stores the endpoints or URLs to relevant educational resources such as PDFs.

ExpectedEndDate.description: The date when the task is expected to end.

ExpectedStartDate.description: The date when the task is expected to start.

ExtlTaskDefIdentifier.description: The ID or URL of the external task definition in the source system.

GroupIdentifier.description: The shared ID of multiple independent tasks.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

LocationId.description: The location where the task is performed.

Name.description: The name of the care task record.

OwnedById.description: The party who's responsible for executing the task.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the care task record.

ProcessStatusId.description: The business-specific process status of the task.

RequestedById.description: The party who created the task.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number in which the task is performed.

ShouldIgnore.description: Indicates if the action specified in the task should be ignored or performed.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the record in the external source system.

SourceSystemModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in the external source system.

SourceSystemName.description: The name of the external source system from which the record was imported.

StatusReason.description: The reason for the status of the task.

TaskId.description: The task associated with the care task.
